text: Barefoot in the Park is a 1967 American romance comedy movie. It was directed by Gene Saks, produced by Hal B. Wallis and written by Neil Simon. It is based on Simon's 1963 play Barefoot in the Park. It is set in Greenwich Village, Manhattan, New York City. It stars Robert Redford and Jane Fonda as newlywed couple Paul and Corie Bratter. Paul is a conservative attorney and Corie is free-spirited. == Other websites == * Category:1967 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in apartment buildings
title: Barefoot in the Park (movie)
